name: Spell Finder - YouTube Context
description: Find selected words in YouTube video contexts using YouGlish.
author: Eugene

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://youglish.com https://*.youglish.com; frame-src 'self' https://youglish.com https://*.youglish.com https://www.youtube.com https://*.youtube.com; img-src 'self' https://youglish.com https://*.youglish.com https://i.ytimg.com https://*.ytimg.com data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://youglish.com https://*.youglish.com;
